title: The Rebellious Villainess Doesn’t Want To Be Swayed By The Obsessive Prince!
summary:
How many more times do I have to be a "villainess" before I can escape this life?"I" have lived as a villainess in many different Otome games. In all of them, the villainess's fiancée is captured by the heroine, the villainess is punished, and so on. No matter how hard I tried, that future would never change. "Villainess?　A broken marriage?　I'm sick of all of them. !!!!At the end of my last episode, I shouted out my complaints to the heavens. I was then reincarnated and began my life as "Catherine the Villainess's daughter" and it was somehow different from before!　My fiancée, who was supposed to abandon me, says that he loves me ........Catherine!?

This is a romantic comedy fantasy about the reincarnated villainess's daughter and an obsessed prince who can't stop loving her.

title: My Childhood Friends Are trying to Kill Me
summary: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

title: The Queen of Retainers is obsessed over at night
S-Class Hunter Heals with Monsters
If a Second Marriage Can Save You
The Young Lady’s Secretary
summary: Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a [Gift] known as [Monster Eater], which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because "eating monsters is vulgar!" Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!

title: The Villainous Family Is Against Independence
summary:
Elodie, the illegitimate daughter of a family of murderous villains with no sense of family, suddenly discovers her past life!

She realizes that she has been reincarnated in a novel she read in a previous life. When the real heroine shows up three years later, she realizes she's been abandoned by her villainous family and is destined to be killed. She was doing okay until her sister showed up, and she thought, "Let's be independent from this family!"

"Independence, what kind of bullshit is that?"

"Who dared to put such ideas into your head?"

"Sister, you don't think you're going to run away by any chance, do you?"

My family is against independence? I want to live, let me be independent!

title: I’m Looking for a New Husband
summary:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…

title: Get Some Honey By Copying Skills
summary:
Junhyuk’s relentless journey to completely rewrite a past filled with regrets begins. After finally obtaining the Stone of Regression with great difficulty, Junhyuk carefully prepares to return to the past. However, an urgent crisis strikes, forcing him to initiate the regression with only the preparations he has managed so far.

“Haha, then let’s meet in the past.” Leaving behind those who sought his life, Junhyuk regresses to the past. “This is the start of something new.” Armed with heightened senses and the ability to copy, Junhyuk embarks on a daring mission to fix a past riddled with regrets.

title: Job Change Log
Starting from Level 1: I’ll Defeat All Reincarnated Monsters in My Secret Dungeon
summary:
Shinobu Ijima, a young man who died with his sister in a sudden explosion, is reincarnated into the world of Lavita Online, a game he played as a hobby. The only problem is, he’s back at level 1…
When Shinobu finds out that his sister will also be reincarnated into his world, he begins a hellish training regime to gain the power to compete against max-level players.
The WEBTOON version of the hugely popular original novel is finally here!!

title: How to survive secretary Hong
Contractual Marriage Vows
Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World’s Richest Person
summary: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…

title: Expelled Hero Is Too Strong
summary:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

title: I, The Demon Lord am being targeted by my female Disciples!
summary: Bai Feng transmigrated into an ancient chinese style dating game and became the Demon Lord, Bai Qingling. The Bai Qingling in the game is cold-hearted and ruthless. In order to seek immortality, he cultivates the Path of Gu, makes human puppets, and does all kinds of evil. What’s even more hateful is that his three stunning female disciples he regards as pawns, are the villain bosses in the game’s “Pure Love” and “Evil Fall” routes! In such a desperate situation, let’s see how Bai Feng can turn the tables with the [Great Love System]!

title: Martial Evolution: Start by Awakening the King of Monsters
summary: A youth named Yi He is reborn into the world of powerful Martial arts and awakens the King of Monsters with the strongest bloodline!

title: Secret Contract With The Black Duke
The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: Licentia Outside the Stone Wall
Monopolizing Fortunes
The Villainous Emperor and the Beloved Family Plan
Love or Love
summary:
"Suck it nicely, you weakling!"

The one servicing that bastard's thing was my beloved girlfriend. There was nothing I could do before that scene...

After starting to play an erotic game recommended by a friend, Mitsuki falls head over heels in love with the game's main heroine, Kotoha. But this game is a NTR game in which the heroine is seduced by the player's best friend, Ryou?! While searching for a happy ending with Kotoha, Mitsuki accidentally falls onto the train platform. When he wakes up, he finds himself faced with none other than… Kotoha!? To his surprise, Mitsuki has been reincarnated as the player character of "that" game…!

With his vast knowledge and love of games, Mitsuki is determined to change fate this time. In order to protect Kotoha and the others from Ryou, he must achieve a perfect happy ending!
___
**Additional Official Raws:**
- Individual Chapters: [comipo](https://comipo.app/series/web/20610/), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CTHPS4K3), [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/811406/)
- Volumes: [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/comic/work/=/product_id/BJ01208710.html)

title: What do you think of cosmic horror?
A Twisted Reunion
I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary:
I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

---
Not all villains are evil. When Suna Choi reincarnates as Edith Rigelhof, the villain from her favorite novel, she is determined to change Edith’s life around and treats everyone with kindness. Although she marries the handsome Killian Rudwick, he is madly in love with the original protagonist of the book and mistrusts Edith because she is from a rival family. Will her marriage survive the whirlwind of family feuds, love triangles, and more? Will Edith find her happy ending?

title: Predatory Marriage
summary:
"Remember? I promised to ruin your life."

When Leah, a devoted princess, faces a tragic downfall, she plots one final revenge against the royal family by becoming an impure bride. Later, when her one-night stand unexpectedly appears, Leah finds herself unable to resist him as he brings madness into her once orderly life.

---
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding. Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family. Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?"
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand. I thought it was meant to end like that. Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life. Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him. What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?" the man said with a fierce smile, "I told you I'd ruin your life."

title: Marry In Bed At 19
summary: “As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”

title: Divine Ring Descends: The Strongest Otherworld
summary: When darkness invades the city, zillions of human warriors come into being, but Aiden isn't one of them. One day, he comes across a mysterious ring and is sent into the Orc Realm where humans are forbidden, by a treaty. He magically survives his execution, lifts the Orc Tribe's sacred hammer, and becomes the tribe leader. Just then, he is transported back to his original reality.

title: An Unseemly Lady
summary:
Julianne is as close to perfect as it gets: she’s got looks, talent, and smarts. The only problem is she has terrible taste in men! That’s why her little sister Lilianne is doing everything she can to make sure she doesn’t end up with the wrong guy. However, Julianne’s suitors are quickly catching on that the way to her heart is through Lilianne’s sweet tooth! How far will Lilianne go to set her sister up with the right man? Who will be the sweetest suitor?

---
I was the only younger sister of the female protagonist in the reverse harem novel. In addition, I was exceptionally pampered by the female lead after waking up after being very sick. I used that to defeat the original inexcusable trash male leads who only hurt my sister…

‘Lili, how are you? Do you like cake?’

‘Lili is really pretty because she resembles her sister. Won’t you eat cookies? Please tell your sister that these were given to you by your wonderful brother.’

‘Would you like to eat this and go over there for a while? I have something to say to your uncle and sister.’

For some reason, the male lead candidates seem anxious to see me.

**

“I don’t play with ugly kids," the boy in front of me muttered with a deep frown.

What? Did you really just say that? I’ll show you what the real world is like.

I gently pulled the hem of my sister’s clothes and shook my head, “I hate him, so I hate the older brother who brought him.”

At the same time, Cedric’s face turned pale, similar to someone who had been sentenced to death.

title: I Saved You, but I’m Not Responsible
summary:
I was the one abandoned, yet I seem to have grown up the most mentally stable! 

I was ordered to serve my fake counterpart as her maid, so I decided to go undercover. But something's off with my former family. Whatever, it's not my problem! So, I just focused on my task... 

"Are you really not going to live with us?"

The eldest, who used to show obsessive control over the fake, started acting strangely toward me. 
"I never thought I’d feel such camaraderie and trust with the opposite sex. You’re strangely too comfortable." 

The second brother, who was on the brink of falling into darkness, managed to get back on track thanks to me. 
"I didn’t come here to help them film their regret-filled family drama." 

I tried to ignore everything and quickly moved on to my next mission… but why do I keep running into people whose lives are completely messed up? 

Why is everyone in perfect need of saving?

title: Welcome to Dungeon Hotel
summary: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

title: The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
summary:
Killed by her own husband, the prince, Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate, she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”

His only condition?

She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.

Surrounded by secrets and shadows, can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?

title: Fakes Don’t Want To Be Real
summary: Humans that wear clothing with ancient elements, knights that use elemental magic, cultivators that soar through the sky on their swords, a loli squad who fights using nanomachines, undeads who came from a door to another world, Super Saiyans… These all aren't important, what's important is: "Do you want to become rich"? Top of the realms! Strongest in the universe! Earning the name of the richest man alive in Forbes! Taking you on journeys around the realms! Teach you how to be the richest! Teaching you how to achieve financial freedom! Earn an astronomically large sum of money!!

title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
summary:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title: The Chick-Class Hunter is Filial!
summary: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old child becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, she is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows her to register caregivers and earn "filial piety points" for growth, she sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

title: Juvenile Prison
summary:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.

title: God of the Apocalypse
summary:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans. Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land. Will humans be found? A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)

title: The Tang Clan Chronicles
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: The Genius Grandson of Namgung Clan
summary: When young Hahyeon Shin’s mother sacrifices herself to give him a chance to escape the family she married into, he finds himself alone in a hostile world. His only goal is to find his mother’s family, the House of Namgung, and train in martial arts to avenge her and become a protector of the innocent. But when he is tested by the Namgung family, they discover that he is a martial arts genius with a perfect physique and the potential to become the greatest martial artist who ever lived.

title: The Regretful Villainess Is Happy Because She Got Divorced
summary: After waking up as the villainess in a dark fantasy romance novel, Marlena was destined to be nothing more than the cold male lead’s scorned wife. Wanting no part in his cruel love story, she demanded a divorce. But just as she begins to enjoy her new life, both her ex-husband and the second male lead start chasing after her!

title: Ministry of Strategy and Finance
summary:
Lee Seong-jun was always a good person. And with a smile on his face, he ran the country into the ground.

Wasting a 5,000 trillion won budget to chase approval ratings plunged South Korea into its second IMF crisis. His life as the president who ruined the country over, Lee Seong-jun finds himself 30 years in the past.

He returns to find a budget proposal — riddled with dirty tricks, corruption, and blatant self-interest — being pushed through the Ministry of Economy and Finance.

title: I Committed a One-Night Mistake with the Young Lady?
I will temporarily protect the male lead
summary:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: I Love the One Who Kills Me
summary:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)

title: The Little Princess Waits for the Breakup
The Blooming Violet in the Back Garden
summary:
On the day the streets and flowers burn, Violeta, a kitchen assistant, wakes up as a saint who is destined to defeat absolute evil. She avoids the corrupt priests and chooses to be the adopted daughter of the king's sword, the Marquis, but just because she was born from a humble region she is treated coldly by the priests.

Among them, the affectionate Daniel is their only consolation. However, at the moment when everyone in the aristocracy rejected her, it was not he who reached out, but Esselmund, the successor to the cold and ruthless Marquis.

"You don't need to do anything, Violeta just needs to stand still and blossom into the little flowers and chaos."

title: The Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

title: The Ordinary Lawyer’s Subspace
summary:
A strange door appears in front of lawyer Han Beom-sang.

Beyond it lies a space where time stands still.

title: The Princess Imprints a Traitor
summary:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---
Other Official Translations:

* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
